metadata.title: CVE-2020-25698 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Users' enrollment capabilities were not being sufficiently checked inMoodle when they are restored into an existing course. This could lead tothem unenrolling users without having permission to do so. Versionsaffected: 3.5 to 3.5.14, 3.7 to 3.7.8, 3.8 to 3.8.5, 3.9 to 3.9.2 andearlier unsupported versions. Fixed in 3.9.3, 3.8.6, 3.7.9, 3.5.15, and3.10.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
